summary: A priest estranged from the holy vows, marries Clara and starts raising a family. After several incidents, he becomes wracked with melancholia and wanders aimlessly, unable to come to terms with his personal truths.
cast: Klaudia Koronel|Joel Torre|Elizabeth Oropesa|Isabel Granada|Mike Magat|Julio Diaz|Ronnie Lazaro|Richard Joson|Lui Manansala|Noel Miralles|Ahven Dumilon|Tonton Sonza|Mark Dionisio|Antonio Lopez|Yolanda Lirios|Anita Rico|Leah Mapula|Raymundo Edna Coronado|Conching Gosiengfiao|Max Paglinawan|Bong Ramos|Gerry Hecto|Rolando Macayanan|Johnny Albia|Joey Quedit|Peping Jimenez|Delia Abucay|Juanito Rangasan|Mary Antonette Macayanan|Sonnie Blue|Suerte Quinajon|Carlo Lasaten|Lauren Joy Pascua|Gladys R. Garcia|Jodelyn Lucero|Judy Ann Lucero|Kristina Cassandra Rosario|Fernan Almazan|Ryan Santos|Randolf Ferrer|James Guitapp|John Pitpit|Eliza Corpuz|Danrea Viernes|Edna Pangted|Jonathan Peque|James Reyes|Richard Reyes|Orville Sanchez|Marie Paul Sanchez|Wilbur Sanchez|Edward Ragusan|Raymond Anunar|Dominador Halog|Ruben Padayao|Remalyn Padamada|Ruben Concepcion|Joshua De Leon|Melencio Pahinag|Bambam Luneta|Jun Fillon|Sofia Loriega|Jimmy Belleza|Jean Villa|Girlie Gosiengfiao Martinez
title: Hubad sa ilalim ng buwan
